org.jcatapult.freemarker
Class OverridingTemplateLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.freemarker.OverridingTemplateLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader
public class OverridingTemplateLoader
extends Object
implements freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader

This class is a free marker template loader that uses the ContainerResolver interface and the current context ClassLoader to find the templates. This provides override support by looking in the container first and then the ClassLoader.

Author:
Brian Pontarelli

Constructor Summary
OverridingTemplateLoader(ContainerResolver containerResolver)
          Creates a resource template loader that will use the specified container resolver to load the resources as well as the current threads context class loader.

Constructor Detail

OverridingTemplateLoader

public OverridingTemplateLoader(ContainerResolver containerResolver)
Creates a resource template loader that will use the specified container resolver to load the resources as well as the current threads context class loader.

Parameters:
containerResolver - The container resolver to use to find the files.
Method Detail

findTemplateSource

public Object findTemplateSource(String name)
                          throws IOException

First looks in the container using the ContainerResolver to get the real path to a File on the file system. If that works, it creates a URL out of the File and returns a new URLTemplateSource from that URL.

If that fails, it tries getting the resource URL frm the ContainerResolver. If that works, it creates a URLTemplateSource from that URL.

If that fails, it tries to get the resource from the current threads context classloader. If that works, it creates a URLTemplateSource from that URL.

Specified by:
findTemplateSource in interface freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader
Parameters:
name - The name of the template.
Returns:
The template or null if it doesn't exist.
Throws:
IOException - If the template could not be resolved.

getReader

public Reader getReader(Object templateSource,
                        String encoding)
                 throws IOException
